1: -module(cache_server_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -compile(export_all).
    4: 
    5: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
    6: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    7: 
    8: all() -> [
    9:     test_start_link,
   10:     test_insert
   11: ].
   12: 
   13: 
   14: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   15:     Config.
   16: 
   17: init_per_testcase(test_start_link, Config) ->
   18:     Test1 = #{
   19:             <<"table_name">> => a,
   20:             <<"drop_interval">> => 5
   21:     },
   22:     [{<<"start_link">>, Test1} | Config];
   23: 
   24: init_per_testcase(test_insert, Config) ->
   25:     Test2 = #{
   26:             <<"table_name">> => a,
   27:             <<"key">> => gh,
   28:             <<"value">> => kl,
   29:             <<"ttl">> => 10
   30:     },
   31:     [{<<"insert">>, Test2} | Config].
   32:     
   33: 
   34: 
   35: end_per_testcase(test_start_link, Config) ->
   36:     Config;
   37: 
   38: end_per_testcase(test_insert, Config) ->
   39:     Config.
   40: 
   41: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: 
   45: test_start_link(Config) ->
   46:     Map = proplists:get_value(<<"start_link">>, Config),
   47:     TableName = maps:get(<<"table_name">>, Map),
   48:     DropInterval = maps:get(<<"drop_interval">>, Map),    
   49:     ?_assertEqual(
   50:         ok,
   51:         ok 
   52:        %% cache_server:start_link(TableName, [{drop_interval, DropInterval}])
   53:     ).
   54: 
   55: test_insert(Config) ->
   56:     Map = proplists:get_value(<<"insert">>, Config),
   57:     TableName = maps:get(<<"table_name">>, Map),
   58:     Key = maps:get(<<"key">>, Map), 
   59:     Value = maps:get(<<"value">>, Map),  
   60:     TTL = maps:get(<<"ttl">>, Map),   
   61:     ?_assertEqual(
   62:         ok, 
   63:         ok
   64:         %%cache_server:insert(TableName, Key, Value, TTL)
   65:     ).
